paragraphs.title: Collaborative Filtering:  Matrix Factorization using Alternating Least Squares (ALS)

itemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: int, timestamp: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Train The ALS Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS

val rank = 10 // this is k
val maxIterations = 20
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val als = new ALS()
  .setRank(rank)
  .setRegParam(convergenceThreshold)
  .setUserCol("userId")
  .setItemCol("itemId")
  .setRatingCol("rating")

val model = als.fit(itemRatingsDF)

result.msg:

paragraphs.text:
val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")

userFactorsDF.map(row => 
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("userId", "userFeatures")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode("overwrite").options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/user-factors-als")
 
itemFactorsDF.map(row => 
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("itemId", "itemFeatures")
 .join(itemsDF, $"itemId" === $"id")
 .select($"itemId", $"title", $"itemFeatures", $"description", $"tags", $"img")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode("overwrite").options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/item-factors-als")

paragraphs.title: Generate Personalized Recommendations For All Users
paragraphs.text:
model.setPredictionCol("confidence")

val recommendationsDF = model.transform(itemRatingsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId"))

val enrichedRecommendationsDF = 
   recommendationsDF.join(itemsDF, $"itemId" === $"id")
   .select($"userId", $"itemId", $"title", $"description", $"tags", $"img", $"confidence")
   .sort($"userId", $"itemId", $"confidence" desc)
   
z.show(enrichedRecommendationsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId", $"title", $"confidence"))

paragraphs.title: userFactor Vector dot product ItemFactor vector
Show Top 5 Similar Items to a given item
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import com.advancedspark.ml.Similarity 

// Given Item: 7 (Spark)
val givenItemId = 7

val givenItemLatentFactors = model.itemFactors.select($"id".as("itemId"), $"features".as("itemFeatures"))
  .where($"itemId" === givenItemId)
  .map(row => (row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble)))
  .collect()

// Convert Array[Double] to DoubleMatrix
val givenItemLatentFactorVector = new DoubleMatrix(givenItemLatentFactors)

// Find Similar Items to the Given Item
val similarItems = model.itemFactors.select($"id".as("itemId"), $"features".as("itemFeatures"))
  .filter($"itemId" !== givenItemId)
  .map{ row =>
     val itemId = row.getInt(0)
     val itemLatentFactor = row.getSeq[Float](1).map(_.toDouble).toArray
     val itemLatentFactorVector = new DoubleMatrix(itemLatentFactor)
     val similarity = Similarity.cosineSimilarity(itemLatentFactorVector, givenItemLatentFactorVector)
     (itemId, similarity)
  }
  
// Sort and Return Top 5 Items by Similarity to Given Item
val sortedSimilarItems = similarItems.top(5)(Ordering.by[(Int, Double), Double] { case (id, similarity) => similarity })

val sortedSimilarItemsDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(sortedSimilarItems).toDF("similarItemId", "similarity")

val enrichedSortedSimilarItemsDF = 
   sortedSimilarItemsDF.join(itemsDF, $"similarItemId" === $"id")
   .select($"similarItemId", $"title", $"description", $"tags", $"img", $"similarity")
   .sort($"similarity" desc)
   
z.show(enrichedSortedSimilarItemsDF.select(lit(givenItemId).as("itemId"), $"similarItemId", $"title", $"similarity"))
